title: CI/CD Pipeline Performance Optimization
description: Analyzes CI/CD pipeline performance and provides optimization recommendations to reduce build times and improve reliability.
template:
Optimize CI/CD pipeline for {{project_name}} on {{ci_system}}.

1. Analyze current pipeline configuration and execution times
2. Identify bottlenecks:
   - Long-running jobs
   - Sequential steps that could be parallel
   - Redundant work across jobs
   - Inefficient caching
3. Review test execution strategy (parallelization, splitting)
4. Assess artifact storage and transfer
5. Optimize Docker builds (layer caching, multi-stage)
6. Recommend caching strategies (dependencies, build outputs)
7. Suggest matrix builds for multi-environment testing
8. Identify opportunities for incremental builds
9. Estimate time savings per optimization
10. Define success metrics

Current pipeline duration: {{current_duration}}
CI System: {{ci_system}}
Pipeline config: {{pipeline_config}}

Output: Bottleneck Analysis | Optimization Plan | Expected Improvements | Implementation Guide

input.pipeline_config: jobs: test: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: checkout, setup-node, npm ci, npm test

examples.output_outline: Bottlenecks: npm ci takes 4m (no cache), tests run sequentially (8m), docker build 5m; optimizations: add npm cache (save 3.5m), parallel test matrix (save 5m), BuildKit + layer cache for Docker (save 3m), total savings: 11.5m â†’ target 7m, implement caching first (quick win)
